question: Which of the following took the title of Yavanarajya sthapanacharya?
explanation: Krishna Deva Raya invaded the Raichur Doab and completely crushed the Adil Shahi of Bijapur. Then he attacked Gulbarga and captured the city of Raichur in c.1520 CE. He restored the Bahmani Sultanate to Muhammad Shah, and Â took the title of Yavanarajya sthapanacharya.
